name: The Secret of Gillwood
storyline: The gods don´t hear the prayers of Gillwood, so it’s now up to you to find out why!The Secret of Gillwood is an single player game with a small open world set in a dark and mysterious world. The player takes control over the most faithful Guardian of the gods.
summary:
The Secret of Gillwood is a single player game set in a dark and mysterious linear world. The player takes control of the most faithful Guardian of the gods.
Your mission is to help the gods of Gillwood, to uncover the mystery that suddenly silenced the town.
